com.team08storyapp

Class AnnotationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.team08storyapp.AnnotationAdapter

  • public class AnnotationAdapter
extends
    AnnotationAdapter is a customized ArrayAdapter that is designed for populating the images and text (if applicable) into right views in a ListView. This class requires at least a list of annotation as the information provider and an activity to get LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  AnnotationAdapter.ViewHolder
      ViewHolder is a like a struct in C++.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnnotationAdapter(Activity activity, int textViewResourceId, java.util.ArrayList<Annotation> annoList)
      The constructor of an AnnotationAdapter requires at least a list of annotation as the information provider and an activity to get LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
      The customized getView will populate images and texts into the passed ListView.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnnotationAdapter

        public AnnotationAdapter(Activity activity,
                 int textViewResourceId,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Annotation> annoList)
        The constructor of an AnnotationAdapter requires at least a list of annotation as the information provider and an activity to get LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE.
        Parameters:
        activity - an activity object that provides LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE
        textViewResourceId - the int value of the id of the view
        annoList - a list of annotations

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        The customized getView will populate images and texts into the passed ListView.
        Parameters:
        position - the index of the selected photo in the adapter
        convertView - the view that is going to be converted to user's desire
        parent - a ViewGroup object
        Returns:
        the converted view for the Annotation
